title: Explanations called from parliamentary employees
byline: The process of re-checking and updating the information of all MPs on the parliamentary website is underway following the discovery that some titles were fake, an informed source said.

title: Gazette issued on Sripada pilgrimage guidelines
byline: A gazette notification was issued to inform the general public about the guidelines they must strictly follow during the Sripada pilgrimage season, which commences today.

title: Security for former Presidents to be periodically reviewed
byline: In the wake of the decision to reduce the number of security personnel assigned to former Presidents, including Mahinda Rajapaksa, police said that the committee appointed to review security will meet periodically and assess reports to determine whether the number of personnel should be further reduced or increased.

title: Extreme heat worsens coconut shortage in Sri Lanka
byline: The high temperatures experienced during the first three months of this year have worsened Sri Lankaâ€™s ongoing coconut shortage, alongside the increasing population of toque macaques, Head of the Department of Crop Science at the Ruhuna University and Senior Lecturer Professor K.K.I.U. Arunakumara said.
